item.title: Did Dallas' win set the table for a playoff run?
item.description: The Cowboys overcame a 21-0 deficit to beat their division rivals, but the path to the postseason is tough.

item.title: UConn's Fudd is new No. 1 as Wings win lottery
item.description: Azzi Fudd is the new projected No. 1 pick after Dallas won the draft lottery for the second consecutive year.
